## md5\_2() function

Returns an md5 hash for the provided string.

Leverages the blueimp-md5 package

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function md5(input: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | String to be hashed |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
